custom_nodes.author: Dr.Lt.Data
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Manager
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Manager itself is also a custom node.

custom_nodes.author: Dr.Lt.Data
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Impact Pack
custom_nodes.description:
This extension offers various detector nodes and detailer nodes that allow you to configure a workflow that automatically enhances facial details. And provide iterative upscaler.

NOTE:MMDetDetectorProvider and other legacy nodes are disabled by default. If you want to activate these nodes and use them, please edit the impact-pack.ini file in the ComfyUI-Impact-Pack directory and change 'mmdet_skip = True' to 'mmdet_skip = False.'

custom_nodes.author: comfyanonymous
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_experiments/sampler_tonemap
custom_nodes.description: ModelSamplerTonemapNoiseTest a node that makes the sampler use a simple tonemapping algorithm to tonemap the noise. It will let you use higher CFG without breaking the image. To using higher CFG lower the multiplier value. Similar to Dynamic Thresholding extension of A1111.

custom_nodes.author: comfyanonymous
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_experiments/sampler_rescalecfg
custom_nodes.description: RescaleClassifierFreeGuidance improves the problem of images being degraded by high CFG.To using higher CFG lower the multiplier value. Similar to Dynamic Thresholding extension of A1111. (reference paper)

custom_nodes.author: comfyanonymous
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_experiments/advanced_model_merging
custom_nodes.description: This provides a detailed model merge feature based on block weight. ModelMergeBlock, in vanilla ComfyUI, allows for adjusting the ratios of input/middle/output layers, but this node provides ratio adjustments for all blocks within each layer.

custom_nodes.author: comfyanonymous
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_experiments/reference_only
custom_nodes.description: This node provides functionality corresponding to Reference only in Controlnet.

custom_nodes.author: Fannovel16
custom_nodes.title: ControlNet Preprocessors
custom_nodes.description:
ControlNet Preprocessors. (To use this extension, you need to download the required model file from Install Models)

NOTE: To use nodes belonging to controlnet v1 such as Canny_Edge_Preprocessor, MIDAS_Depth_Map_Preprocessor, Uniformer_SemSegPreprocessor, etc., you need to copy the config.yaml.example file to config.yaml and change skip_v1: True to skip_v1: False.

custom_nodes.author: biegert
custom_nodes.title: CLIPSeg
custom_nodes.description: The CLIPSeg node generates a binary mask for a given input image and text prompt.

custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Cutoff
custom_nodes.description: These custom nodes provides features that allow for better control over the effects of the text prompt.

custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: Advanced CLIP Text Encode
custom_nodes.description: Advanced CLIP Text Encode (if you need A1111 like prompt. you need this. But Cutoff node includes this feature, already.)

custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Noise
custom_nodes.description: This extension contains 6 nodes for ComfyUI that allows for more control and flexibility over the noise.

custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: Tiled sampling for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This extension contains a tiled sampler for ComfyUI. It allows for denoising larger images by splitting it up into smaller tiles and denoising these. It tries to minimize any seams for showing up in the end result by gradually denoising all tiles one step at the time and randomizing tile positions for every step.

custom_nodes.author: BlenderNeko
custom_nodes.title: (WIP) SeeCoder
custom_nodes.description: It provides the capability to generate CLIP from an image input, unlike unCLIP, which works in all models. (To use this extension, you need to download the required model file from Install Models)

custom_nodes.author: LucianoCirino
custom_nodes.title: Efficiency Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of ComfyUI custom nodes to help streamline workflows and reduce total node count.

custom_nodes.author: Derfuu
custom_nodes.title: Derfuu_ComfyUI_ModdedNodes
custom_nodes.description: Automate calculation depending on image sizes or something you want.

custom_nodes.author: paulo-coronado
custom_nodes.title: comfy_clip_blip_node
custom_nodes.description: CLIPTextEncodeBLIP: This custom node provides a CLIP Encoder that is capable of receiving images as input.

custom_nodes.author: Davemane42
custom_nodes.title: Visual Area Conditioning / Latent composition
custom_nodes.description: This tool provides custom nodes that allow visualization and configuration of area conditioning and latent composite.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: WAS Node Suite
custom_nodes.description: A node suite for ComfyUI with many new nodes, such as image processing, text processing, and more.

custom_nodes.author: omar92
custom_nodes.title: Quality of life Suit:V2
custom_nodes.description: openAI suite, String suite, Latent Tools, Image Tools: These custom nodes provide expanded functionality for image and string processing, latent processing, as well as the ability to interface with models such as ChatGPT/DallE-2.

custom_nodes.author: lilly1987
custom_nodes.title: simple wildcard for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: These custom nodes provides a feature to insert arbitrary inputs through wildcards in the prompt. Additionally, this tool provides features that help simplify workflows, such as VAELoaderDecoder and SimplerSample.

custom_nodes.author: sylym
custom_nodes.title: Vid2vid
custom_nodes.description: A node suite for ComfyUI that allows you to load image sequence and generate new image sequence with different styles or content.

custom_nodes.author: EllangoK
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-post-processing-nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of post processing nodes for ComfyUI, simply download this repo and drag.

custom_nodes.author: LEv145
custom_nodes.title: ImagesGrid
custom_nodes.description: This tool provides a viewer node that allows for checking multiple outputs in a grid, similar to the X/Y Plot extension.

custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Pixel Sort, Swap Color Mode, Solid Color, Glitch This, Add Text To Image, Play Sound, Prettify Prompt, Generate Noise, Flatten Colors

custom_nodes.description: This is a node pack for ComfyUI, primarily dealing with masks.

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for the Ultimate Stable Diffusion Upscale script by Coyote-A.

Allor is a plugin for ComfyUI with an emphasis on transparency and performance.

NOTE: If you do not disable the default node override feature in the settings, the built-in nodes, namely ImageScale and ImageScaleBy nodes, will be disabled. (ref: Configutation)

custom_nodes.author: civitai
custom_nodes.title: comfy-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: CivitAI_Loaders. Load Checkpoints, and LORA models directly from CivitAI API.

custom_nodes.author: andersxa
custom_nodes.title: CLIP Directional Prompt Attention
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: CLIP Directional Prompt Attention Encode. Direction prompt attention tries to solve the problem of contextual words (or parts of the prompt) having an effect on much later or irrelevant parts of the prompt.

custom_nodes.author: ArtVentureX
custom_nodes.title: AnimateDiff
custom_nodes.description:
AnimateDiff integration for ComfyUI, adapts from sd-webui-animatediff.

You only need to download one of mm_sd_v14.ckpt | mm_sd_v15.ckpt. Put the model weights under ComfyUI/custom_nodes/comfyui-animatediff/models. DO NOT change model filename.

custom_nodes.author: twri
custom_nodes.title: SDXL Prompt Styler
custom_nodes.description: SDXL Prompt Styler is a node that enables you to style prompts based on predefined templates stored in a JSON file.

custom_nodes.author: daxthin
custom_nodes.title: facedetailer
custom_nodes.description: Face Detailer is a custom node for the 'ComfyUI' framework inspired by !After Detailer extension from auto1111, it allows you to detect faces using Mediapipe and YOLOv8n to create masks for the detected faces.

custom_nodes.author: asagi4
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI prompt control
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for convenient prompt editing. The aim is to make basic generations in ComfyUI completely prompt-controllable.

custom_nodes.author: jamesWalker55
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - P2LDGAN Node
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: P2LDGAN. This integrates P2LDGAN into ComfyUI. P2LDGAN extracts lineart from input images.

To use this extension, you need to download the p2ldgan model and save it in the ComfyUI/custom_nodes/comfyui-p2ldgan/checkpoints directory.

custom_nodes.author: adieyal
custom_nodes.title: DynamicPrompts Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Random Prompts, Combinatorial Prompts, I'm Feeling Lucky, Magic Prompt, Jinja2 Templates. ComfyUI-DynamicPrompts is a custom nodes library that integrates into your existing ComfyUI Library. It provides nodes that enable the use of Dynamic Prompts in your ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: mihaiiancu

custom_nodes.author: kwaroran

custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Remove Image Background (abg). A Anime Background Remover node for comfyui, based on this hf space, works same as AGB extention in automatic1111.

custom_nodes.author: twri
custom_nodes.title: SDXL Prompt Styler
custom_nodes.description: SDXL Prompt Styler is a node that enables you to style prompts based on predefined templates stored in a JSON file. The node specifically replaces a {prompt} placeholder in the 'prompt' field of each template with provided positive text.
